name: GreenTopia Explorer (Endless Runner)
description:
First game!! 

You play as a rocket exploring a planet called GreenTopia. Avoid colliding with mountains there.

Update Log

1.0 - Official Release

1.1 - Fixed that so you can't pause after you're ded

1.2 - Fixed that so the resolution fits on all devices and improved graphics a little

1.3 - Added the option to toggle music

1.4 - Increased the gravity of the planet so now the game is harder
